Detailed Description

Used for storing signposts of connections.

Member Function Documentation

bool SignPostTable::addSignPostElm (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID,
uint32  signPostIdx,
uint32  signPostSetIdx,
uint32  signPostElmIdx,
const GMSSignPostElm &  signPostElm
) 
 

Adds a sign post part valid for the connection from fromNodeID to toNodeID.

Parameters:
fromNodeID The node from which the connection of this sign post data is to be stored.
toNodeID The node to which the connection of this sing post data is to be stored.
signPostIdx The index of this sign post. There may be many sign posts stored for the same connection.
singPostSetIdx The sign post set to add the sign post data to.
signPostElmIdx The sign post part within the set to add the signpost data to.
singPostElm The sign post data to add.
Returns:
Returns false if the sing post could not be added.

bool SignPostTable::addSingleElmSignPost (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID,
const GMSSignPostElm &  signPostElm
) 
 

Creates a new sign post, if the text in signPostElm does not already exist, and adds it as its only element.

Parameters:
fromNodeID The node from which the connection of this sign post data is to be stored.
toNodeID The node to which the connection of this sing post data is to be stored.
signPostElm The text to use for this sign post.
Returns:
Returns false if the sing post could not be added.

Copies the sign post stored in otherMap on (otherFromNodeID, otherToNodeID),to the map theMap on (fromNodeID, toNodeID).

Returns:
Nubmer of sing posts copied.

Removes the sing post element matching singPostText.

Parameters:

Returns:

)

uint32  toNodeID,

Returns:
Returns true if a sing post composed by ony one sign post elememt which equals signPostElm exists for the connection from fromNodeID to toNodeID.
